thread.title: Great Hotel!
thread.title_full: Great Hotel! - Review of Royal Park Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Elizabeth G
title: Great Hotel!
text:
I booked 3 nights at the Royal Park Hotel! great Hotel and Great location closer to the subway, and everything else, the room was very
clean, nice TV, clean shower, and most important right on a budget.
I would definitely stay here again!!...
Thank you! STAFF!!!
Best,
Elizabeth Vivas.
Room Tip: corner suites are better! See more room tips
